topic: How to document ETL jobs using fastapi with Python 3.12+
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: How to document ETL jobs using fastapi with Python 3.12+

response_parsed.title: Documenting ETL Jobs Using FastAPI with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide demonstrates how to document ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) jobs using FastAPI, a modern, high-performance web framework for building APIs in Python 3.12+.
key_points: FastAPI enables the creation of well-documented APIs that are easy to understand and use.
ETL jobs can be documented as FastAPI endpoints, providing a standardized interface for data processing tasks.
Python 3.12+ features such as improved type hinting and type variances are leveraged for better documentation and code readability.
FastAPI provides automatic generation of OpenAPI specifications, making it easier to share and collaborate on API designs.
version_notes: Python 3.12+ is required for improved type hinting and type variances, making FastAPI's documentation even more accurate and useful.
FastAPI version x.y.z is used in this example.
caveats: While this guide focuses on ETL jobs, FastAPI can be applied to various other types of APIs as well.
Ensure that your FastAPI project adheres to best practices for security, performance, and maintainability.
